title: This War of Mine [R.G. Mechanics]
description:
Year: 2014 Genre: Adventure, Indie, Simulation Developer: 11 bit studios Publisher: 11 bit studios Publication Type: RePack Language: RUS | ENG | Multi7 Voice set Language: ENG Tablet: ALI213

"InÂ« This War of Mine Â»you are not playing for soldier of elite troops, and for a group of civilians trying to survive in the besieged city, experiencing a shortage of food, medicines and constant danger from snipers and looters. The game gives you the opportunity to experience a war with a completely new perspective. Gameplay Â«This War of MineÂ» depends on the change of days and nights. Snipers do not allow you to leave the shelter during the day, so you have to do other things - to rebuild their shelter, to trade, to take care of the survivors. At night, choosing one of the unique locations, you can send someone to look for provisions that will help you stay alive. Make decisions based on their moral principles. Try to preserve all of their people or sacrifice someone to improve the chances of the others. During the war, there are no good or bad decisions, there are only task - to survive. The sooner you realize this, the better.

Features:
"Is based on real

events" Manage the actions survivors and rebuild the

shelter, "a master of weapons, alcohol, bed, stove - anything that will help you

survive" Make decisions - often unpleasant and emotionally

challenging, "Randomized world and characters in each

game" style graphics charcoal drawings, which perfectly reflects the climate of the game
